prompt: Zerodha may charge You for using the APIs, or parts of it selectively. These charges may be fixed or variable, and are at the sole discretion of Zerodha. Zerodha may also propose additional charges to You, (based on your usage of the APIs and on a case-by-case basis) for the continued use of the APIs. You may write to the relevant department to discuss a pricing suitable for You (Zerodha may decline or accept such a request based on various factors).
completion: Zerodha can apply charges for API usage, which may vary and are determined solely by Zerodha. Additional charges may also be proposed for continued API usage, based on individual usage and assessed case-by-case. You can contact the relevant department to discuss suitable pricing options, subject to Zerodha's discretion in accepting or declining such requests.

prompt: Zerodha does not make any promises, commitments, guarantees about the APIs or related offerings. When permitted by law, Zerodha will not be responsible for lost profits, revenues, or data; financial losses; or indirect, special, consequential, exemplary, or punitive damages. To the extent permitted by law, Zerodha excludes all warranties, guarantees, conditions, representations, and undertakings.
completion: Zerodha does not guarantee the APIs or related offerings and is not liable for financial losses or damages. All warranties and commitments are excluded as permitted by law.

prompt: Late payments may bear interest at the rate of 1.5% per month (or the highest rate permitted by law, if less) from the payment due date until paid in full. Customer will be responsible for all reasonable expenses (including attorneys' fees) incurred by Google in collecting such delinquent amounts. Further, if Customers payment for the Services is overdue, Google may Suspend the Services.
completion: Late payments may accrue interest at 1.5% per month. Customer is responsible for reasonable collection expenses. If payment is overdue, Google may suspend Services.

prompt: This agreement is effective until terminated. User rights under this agreement will terminate automatically or otherwise cease to be effective without notice from Zerodha if user fails to comply with any terms and conditions under this agreement. Zerodha may terminate this agreement if User is in default of any of the terms and conditions of this agreement and fails to correct such default within ten (10) days after written notice thereof from Zerodha. Upon termination, Zerodha does not hold any liability or other obligation to you. If you want to terminate the Terms, you must provide Zerodha with prior written notice and upon termination, cease your use of the applicable APIs, use of Zerodha brand and delete any cached or stored content that was permitted by the cache header.
completion: This agreement is in effect until terminated. User rights will end automatically if terms are violated. Zerodha may terminate this agreement with a ten-day notice for default. After termination, Zerodha has no liability or obligations. To terminate, provide written notice, stop API use and delete permitted cached content.

prompt: The Client agrees to pay Zerodha any brokerage, commission, fees, service tax and other taxes and transaction charges as agreed upon and due from time to time, as applied to such Client's account, transactions, and trading ledger by Zerodha, for the services that the Client receives from Zerodha.
completion: The Client is responsible for paying Zerodha brokerage, commission, fees, taxes, and transaction charges as agreed upon, applicable to their account, transactions, and trading ledger, for the services provided by Zerodha.

prompt: Customer will pay all Fees in the currency stated in the invoice. All Fees are due 30 days after the invoice date. Google has no obligation to provide multiple invoices. Payments made via wire transfer must include the bank information provided by Google.
completion: Customer must pay all Fees in the invoiced currency within 30 days of the invoice date. Google is not obligated to provide multiple invoices. Wire transfer payments must include the provided bank information.

prompt: Google may change the Prices at any time unless otherwise expressly agreed in an addendum or Order Form. Google will notify Customer at least 30 days in advance of any changes. Customer's pricing will change at the beginning of Customers next Order Term after the 30-day period.
completion: Google can change Prices unless otherwise agreed. Customer will receive a 30-day advance notice for any changes. Pricing adjustments will apply to the next Order Term.

prompt: Service Fees. We calculate and bill fees and charges monthly. We may bill you more frequently for fees accrued if we suspect that your account is fraudulent or at risk of non-payment. You will pay us the applicable fees and charges for use of the Services as described on the AWS Site using one of the payment methods we support. All amounts payable by you under this Agreement will be paid to us without setoff or counterclaim, and without any deduction or withholding. Fees and charges for any new Service or new feature of a Service will be effective when we post updated fees and charges on the AWS Site, unless we expressly state otherwise in a notice. We may increase or add new fees and charges for any existing Services you are using by giving you at least 30 days prior notice. We may elect to charge you interest at the rate of 1.5% per month (or the highest rate permitted by law, if less) on all late payments.
completion: We bill fees and charges monthly, with the possibility of more frequent billing for suspected fraud or non-payment risks. You must pay the applicable fees as described on the AWS Site using supported payment methods. Payments should be made without setoff, counterclaim, deduction, or withholding. New Service fees are effective upon updated postings on the AWS Site, with at least 30 days' notice for increased or new fees on existing Services. Late payments may incur interest at 1.5% per month (or the highest rate allowed by law).

prompt: Effect of Suspension. If we suspend your right to access or use any portion or all of the Services: (a) you remain responsible for all fees and charges you incur during the period of suspension; and (b) you will not be entitled to any service credits under the Service Level Agreements for any period of suspension.
completion: During a suspension: (a) You are still responsible for all incurred fees and charges. (b) No service credits will be provided under the Service Level Agreements for the suspension period.

prompt: Fees and Charges will be applicable on my account and for other services availed by me, as described in the Most Important Document / schedule of charges and on the website www.axisbank.com. GST and other statutory imposts as applicable from time to time will be levied on all fees.
completion: Fees and charges apply to my account and other services as described in the Most Important Document and on www.axisbank.com. GST and other applicable statutory fees will be levied on all fees.

prompt: I authorize the bank to close my account, with prior intimation to me, in case of a. balance in the account remains zero for 3 months or more b. high occurrences of dishonoured payments from my account. c. Initial funding cheque is returned / bounced and funding as per scheme code is not received within 30 days of account opening d. Non-activated instakits in case account is not activated within 30 days once initiated for activation e. Branch Personnel is unable to successfully verify details of the account f. Unsatisfactory conduct of the account.
completion: The bank may close my account with prior notice if: a. The account remains zero for 3 months or more. b. There are frequent dishonoured payments. c. The initial funding cheque is returned or not received within 30 days of account opening. d. Instakits are not activated within 30 days of initiation. e. Account details cannot be successfully verified by Branch Personnel. f. The account shows unsatisfactory conduct.

prompt: For Recurring Deposits opened on or after 9th August,2016, in case of delay in payment of any instalment/s beyond the calendar month, the depositor /s shall be liable to pay a penalty at Rs. 10 per Rs. 1000 per month for the period of delay.
completion: For Recurring Deposits opened after 9th August, 2016, delayed payment of instalments beyond the calendar month will incur a penalty of Rs. 10 per Rs. 1000 per month.

prompt: The penalty so leviable shall be deducted from the total payment payable at the time of maturity of the Recurring Deposit.
completion: The penalty will be deducted from the total payment at the time of maturity of the Recurring Deposit.

prompt: TDS rates will be applicable from time to time as per the Income Tax Act, 1961 and Income Tax rules.
completion: TDS rates will be applicable as per the Income Tax Act, 1961 and rules.

prompt: I / We understand that notice for AQB non-maintenance will be sent on end of 2nd month of the quarter in which AQB is not maintained. If AQB is not maintained in the subsequent month of that quarter then non maintenance charges for that entire quarter will be levied.
completion: Notice for AQB non-maintenance will be sent at the end of the 2nd month of the quarter. If AQB is not maintained in the subsequent month of that quarter, non-maintenance charges for the entire quarter will be levied.

prompt: In case of premature closure within a month, no interest shall be paid out & only principal amount shall be returned.
completion: Premature closure within a month results in no interest payment, only the principal amount will be returned.

prompt: In the event of death of one of the joint account holders, the right to the deposit proceeds does not automatically devolve on the surviving joint deposit account holder, unless there is a survivorship clause.
completion: Upon the death of one joint account holder, the right to the deposit proceeds does not automatically transfer to the surviving joint account holder, unless a survivorship clause is in place.

prompt: You may cancel Your request for a Ride from a Driver at any time, however, subject to clause 7.3, You may be charged a Cancellation Fee according to our cancellation policy which can be found on our Website.
completion: You can cancel your ride request at any time, but a Cancellation Fee may be charged as per our cancellation policy on our website (subject to clause 7.3).

prompt: You must be at least 13 years old to use the Services. If you are under 18 you must have your parent or legal guardians permission to use the Services. If you use the Services on behalf of another person or entity, you must have the authority to accept the Terms on their behalf. You must provide accurate and complete information to register for an account. You may not make your access credentials or account available to others outside your organization, and you are responsible for all activities that occur using your credentials.
completion: You must be at least 13 years old.

prompt: Use of Services. You may access, and we grant you a non-exclusive right to use, the Services in accordance with these Terms. You will comply with these Terms and all applicable laws when using the Services. We and our affiliates own all rights, title, and interest in and to the Services.Feedback. We appreciate feedback, comments, ideas, proposals and suggestions for improvements. If you provide any of these things, we may use it without restriction or compensation to you.Restrictions. You may not (i) use the Services in a way that infringes, misappropriates or violates any persons rights; (ii) reverse assemble, reverse compile, decompile, translate or otherwise attempt to discover the source code or underlying components of models, algorithms, and systems of the Services (except to the extent such restrictions are contrary to applicable law); (iii) use output from the Services to develop models that compete with OpenAI; (iv) except as permitted through the API, use any automated or programmatic method to extract data or output from the Services, including scraping, web harvesting, or web data extraction; (v) represent that output from the Services was human-generated when it is not or otherwise violate our Usage Policies; (vii) buy, sell, or transfer API keys without our prior consent; or (viii), send us any personal information of children under 13 or the applicable age of digital consent. You will comply with any rate limits and other requirements in our documentation. You may use Services only in geographies currently supported by OpenAI.Third Party Services. Any third party software, services, or other products you use in connection with the Services are subject to their own terms, and we are not responsible for third party products.
completion: No competing models with OpenAI, and no personal info of children under 13 without parental/guardian consent.and  Separate terms apply for third-party services used with OpenAI and OpenAI is not liable for them.

prompt: Your Content. You may provide input to the Services (“Input”), and receive output generated and returned by the Services based on the Input (“Output”). Input and Output are collectively “Content.” As between the parties and to the extent permitted by applicable law, you own all Input. Subject to your compliance with these Terms, OpenAI hereby assigns to you all its right, title and interest in and to Output. This means you can use Content for any purpose, including commercial purposes such as sale or publication, if you comply with these Terms. OpenAI may use Content to provide and maintain the Services, comply with applicable law, and enforce our policies. You are responsible for Content, including for ensuring that it does not violate any applicable law or these Terms.Use of Content to Improve Services. We do not use Content that you provide to or receive from our API (“API Content”) to develop or improve our Services. We may use Content from Services other than our API (“Non-API Content”) to help develop and improve our Services. You can read more here about how Non-API Content may be used to improve model performance. If you do not want your Non-API Content used to improve Services, you can opt out by filling out this form. Please note that in some cases this may limit the ability of our Services to better address your specific use case.
completion: User input is owned by the user, while OpenAI assigns all rights to the output, which should be evaluated for accuracy and may require human review.

prompt: Ownership of rights to the Services; Compliance with Terms and applicable laws.Usage of feedback, comments, ideas, proposals, and suggestions for improvements provided without restriction or compensation to the user. Disclaimer of responsibility for third-party software, services, or products used in connection with the Services.
completion: compliance with applicable laws

prompt: Ownership of Input by the user.Similarity of Output generated for different users.Use of Non-API Content to improve the Services.Probabilistic nature of machine learning and the need for users to evaluate the accuracy of Output.
completion: Users should be aware of data privacy policies and evaluate the accuracy of ML outputs.

prompt: You are responsible for all Taxes associated with your purchase, and we may invoice you for such Taxes. OpenAI uses the name and address in your account registration as the place of supply for tax purposes.We may change our prices by posting notice, and any price changes will apply to Fees charged to your account after the effective date of the changes.
completion: once a payment is made, it cannot be refunded unless there is a provision in the Agreement that allows for it. This is an important term to consider when deciding to use OpenAI's Services.

prompt: Confidentiality. You may be given access to Confidential Information of OpenAI, its affiliates and other third parties. You may use Confidential Information only as needed to use the Services as permitted under these Terms. You may not disclose Confidential Information to any third party, and you will protect Confidential Information in the same manner that you protect your own confidential information of a similar nature, using at least reasonable care. Confidential Information means nonpublic information that OpenAI or its affiliates or third parties designate as confidential or should reasonably be considered confidential under the circumstances, including software, specifications, and other nonpublic business information. Confidential Information does not include information that: (i) is or becomes generally available to the public through no fault of yours; (ii) you already possess without any confidentiality obligations when you received it under these Terms; (iii) is rightfully disclosed to you by a third party without any confidentiality obligations; or (iv) you independently developed without using Confidential Information. You may disclose Confidential Information when required by law or the valid order of a court or other governmental authority if you give reasonable prior written notice to OpenAI and use reasonable efforts to limit the scope of disclosure, including assisting us with challenging the disclosure requirement, in each case where possible.
completion: confidentiality is a critical term as it pertains to protecting nonpublic information that OpenAI or its affiliates or third parties designate as confidential or should reasonably be considered confidential under the circumstances. Failure to comply with confidentiality requirements can result in legal and financial repercussions for the parties involved.

prompt: The Terms remain in effect until terminated.Users can terminate at any time by discontinuing use of Services, OpenAI may provide 30 daysâ notice before termination.OpenAI may immediately terminate upon material breach of certain sections or to comply with law or government requests.OpenAI may suspend access if user does not comply or use poses security risk or fraud.Upon termination, user must stop using Services and return or destroy Confidential Information.Certain sections of the Terms survive termination or expiration.
completion: OpenAI may immediately terminate these Terms upon notice to the user if there is a material breach of Sections 2 (Usage Requirements), 5 (Confidentiality, Security and Data Protection), 8 (Dispute Resolution) or 9 (General Terms), or to comply with law or government requests. This means that it is important for the user to adhere to these sections to avoid termination of the agreement.

prompt: Indemnity: User must defend, indemnify, and hold OpenAI, its affiliates, and personnel harmless from any claims arising from user's use of the Services, including their Content or products, and any breach of Terms or violation of law..Disclaimer: OpenAI and its affiliates offer the Services as is and do not provide any warranties, including those of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. They do not guarantee uninterrupted, accurate or error-free Services or secure content.
completion: It means that the user is responsible to defend, indemnify, and hold OpenAI, its affiliates, and personnel harmless from any claims arising from the user's use of the Services, including their Content or products, and any breach of Terms or violation of law.

prompt: Mandatory Arbitration - All disputes related to OpenAI services must be resolved through final and binding arbitration.Informal Dispute Resolution - Users must try to resolve the disputes informally before filing a claim against OpenAI, and any statute of limitations will be tolled during the 60-day resolution process.Arbitration Forum - Either party can commence binding arbitration through ADR Services, and the parties will pay equal shares of the arbitration fees.
completion: OpenAI requires users to settle disputes through final arbitration..Users must agree to this in order to use OpenAI services..Disputes can only be brought up individually, not as part of a class action.

prompt: Term of service: The terms of service (TOS) are effective from the moment the user begins utilizing the service, and will continue until the user terminates their account or the service is terminated by the provider. Changes to the TOS may be made from time to time by the provider, and the user will be notified of any changes via email or on the provider's website.
completion: By utilizing the services of the provider, the user agrees to be bound by the TOS, as well as any updates or changes made to it in the future. It is recommended that the user review the TOS regularly to stay informed of these updates.

prompt: Restrictions on use: Users agree to use the services only for legal, proper purposes and not for any illegal or unauthorized purpose or any other purpose that may diminish the quality of the services or expose the provider to potential liability. Users may not attempt to access any information or content on the provider's servers or networks without authorization, nor may they harass or intimidate any other user or person through the use of the services.
completion: The provider reserves the right to suspend or terminate the user's access to the services at any time, for any reason, without notice or warning, if the user is found to be in violation of these restrictions on use.

prompt: Intellectual Property: All content provided by the provider is protected by copyright, trademark, and other applicable intellectual property laws. Users agree not to copy, reproduce, distribute, or otherwise exploit any content provided by the provider without the express written consent of the provider.
completion: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the provider from any and all claims, damages, expenses, or losses that may arise from their unauthorized use, distribution, or exploitation of the provider's intellectual property.

prompt: Privacy Policy: The provider is committed to protecting the privacy of its users, and will not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose any personal information collected through the use of the services to any third party without the user's express consent. The provider may collect certain user information, such as IP addresses, browser types, and operating systems, to improve the quality of the services and to ensure compliance with the TOS.
completion: By utilizing the services of the provider, the user acknowledges and agrees to the collection, use, and disclosure of their personal information in accordance with the terms set forth in this Privacy Policy.

prompt: User Content: Users are solely responsible for any content they upload, post, or otherwise transmit through the services of the provider. Users agree not to upload content that is illegal, offensive, or otherwise violates the TOS or the intellectual property rights of any third party. The provider reserves the right to remove any user content that violates these terms, or to suspend or terminate the user's access to the services.
completion: By uploading or otherwise transmitting any content through the provider's services, the user grants the provider a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, worldwide license to use, modify, and distribute that content for any lawful purpose, including the promotion of the provider's services.

prompt: Warranties and Liabilities: The provider makes no warranties or representations regarding the reliability or availability of its services, and disclaims any liability for damages or losses arising from the use of the services. Users utilize the services at their own risk, and the provider will not be held liable for any direct, indirect, consequential, or incidental damages arising from the use of the services.
completion: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the provider from any and all claims, damages, expenses, or losses that may arise as a result of their use of the services, including any claims arising from their violation of the TOS or their infringement of any third party's intellectual property rights.

prompt: Payment Terms: Users who wish to access premium features of the provider's services will be required to pay a monthly or yearly subscription fee. Payment for services is due at the beginning of each subscription period, and users who fail to pay may have their access to the services suspended or terminated.
completion: The provider reserves the right to change the pricing and availability of its services at any time, and will notify users of any changes to the payment terms via email or on the provider's website.

prompt: Termination: The provider reserves the right to terminate the user's access to the services at any time, for any reason, without notice or warning. Users may also terminate their account at any time by contacting the provider's customer support team or using the tools provided in their user account settings.
completion: Upon termination of the user's account, any content uploaded, posted, or otherwise transmitted through the services will be deleted, and the provider will have no obligation to provide the user with a copy of that content.

prompt: Governing Law: These terms of service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the provider is headquartered. Any disputes arising from the use of the services shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the selected arbitration association.
completion: The user agrees to submit to the jurisdiction of the courts located in the jurisdiction in which the provider is headquartered for any legal action arising from or related to the use of the services or the TOS.

prompt: Acceptable Use: Users agree to use the services only for lawful and ethical purposes, and not to engage in any activity that is illegal, infringing, or harms the provider, its employees, or other users. Users may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the provider's network or systems, nor may they distribute any malicious software or other harmful computer code through the services.
completion: The provider reserves the right to investigate any suspected violation of the acceptable use policy, and to take any action, including suspension or termination of the user's account, as deemed necessary to protect the integrity of the services.

prompt: DMCA Policy: The provider respects the intellectual property rights of others, and complies with the provisions of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. If a user believes that their intellectual property rights have been violated through the use of the services, they may send a notice to the provider's designated agent.
completion: The provider will investigate all notices of alleged infringement, and may remove or disable content that is found to be infringing. Users who repeatedly violate the DMCA policy may have their access to the services suspended or terminated.

prompt: Prohibited Conduct: Users may not use the services to harass, bully, or discriminate against any other user or individual. Users also may not engage in any activity that is harmful to minors or contains explicit or inappropriate content. The provider reserves the right to remove any user content that violates these policies, and to take any necessary action to protect the safety and well-being of its users.
completion: The provider may report any prohibited conduct to the appropriate law enforcement authorities, and may cooperate with those authorities in any investigation or prosecution related to such conduct.

prompt: Severability: If any provision of these terms of service is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. The provider reserves the right to modify these terms at any time, and will provide notice of any changes via email or on the provider's website.
completion: By continuing to use the services after the effective date of any changes to these terms, the user agrees to be bound by the modified terms, and acknowledges that they have had an opportunity to review and understand the changes.

prompt: Terms of Service: These terms of service apply to all users who access or use the services provided by the provider. By accessing or using the services, the user agrees to be bound by these terms of service and any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific services.
completion: Users who do not agree to be bound by these terms of service should not access or use the provider's services.

prompt: Cookies Policy: The provider may use cookies to improve the user's experience while using the services. Cookies may store user preferences, login information, and other data that helps the provider provide a better service. Users may disable cookies in their browser settings if they do not wish to accept them.
completion: By using the services with cookies enabled, the user consents to the provider's use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

prompt: Age Restrictions: Users who are under the age of 13 may not use the provider's services. Users who are between the ages of 13 and 17 must have parental consent to use the services.
completion: The provider reserves the right to terminate the account of any user who is found to be underage or who does not have proper parental consent.

prompt: Content Ownership: Users retain ownership of any content they upload or post through the provider's services. The provider does not claim ownership of user-generated content, but may use it in accordance with the license granted in the following section.
completion: Users are solely responsible for ensuring that they have the right to upload or post any content they provide through the services.

prompt: License: By uploading or posting content through the provider's services, the user grants the provider a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, perform, and display that content in any media, format, or platform now known or hereafter invented.
completion: This license survives termination of the user's account, and the user agrees to waive any moral rights they may have in relation to their uploaded content.

prompt: Indemnification: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the provider, its affiliates, and its employees from any and all claims, damages, or expenses arising from their use of the services or their violation of these terms of service.
completion: This indemnification includes, but is not limited to, any claims related to copyright or trademark infringement, defamation, or violation of privacy or publicity rights.

prompt: Prohibited Uses: Users may not use the provider's services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. Users may not upload or post any content that is defamatory, obscene, or offensive, or that infringes on any third-party intellectual property rights. The provider reserves the right to remove any content that violates these prohibitions or to suspend or terminate a user's account for any such violation.
completion: Users may not use any automated means to access the services, or to collect or harvest any data from the provider's systems or networks without the provider's express written consent.

completion: Continued use of the provider's services following any such changes constitutes the user's acceptance of the modified terms of service.

prompt: No Warranty: The provider makes no warranty or representation that the services will meet the user's requirements, that the services will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free, or that the results obtained from the use of the services will be accurate or reliable. Users use the provider's services at their own risk.

prompt: Limitation of Liability: The provider's liability to the user shall not exceed the amount paid by the user to the provider for the use of the services in the six months prior to the event giving rise to the claim. The provider shall not be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of the services.
completion: This limitation of liability applies to all claims, regardless of whether they are based on breach of contract, warranty, tort, product liability, or any other legal theory.

prompt: Arbitration: Any dispute arising out of or relating to these terms of service or the user's use of the services shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. The arbitration shall be conducted in the English language and shall be held in the jurisdiction where the provider is headquartered.
completion: The costs of the arbitration shall be borne equally by the parties, and the decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding on both parties.

prompt: Confidentiality: The user agrees to keep confidential any proprietary or confidential information provided by the provider, including but not limited to trade secrets, business strategies, financial information, and personal information.
completion: The user also agrees not to use or disclose any such information for any purpose other than the use of the services provided by the provider.

prompt: Cancellation and Refund Policy: Users who wish to cancel a subscription to the provider's services may do so at any time by contacting the provider's customer support team. Refunds will be issued only in accordance with the provider's refund policy, which may be modified at any time.
completion: Users who cancel their subscription will have their access to the provider's services revoked at the end of the current subscription period.

If a user believes that their work has been copied and posted through the provider's services in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, they may submit a DMCA notice to the provider's designated agent.

The provider may also take any other action it reasonably deems necessary to prevent further breach, including without limitation, seeking injunctive relief.

Any dispute arising out of or relating to these terms of service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in that jurisdiction.
completion: The user agrees to submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts for that purpose and waives any objection to the jurisdiction or venue of such courts.

The provider may terminate these terms if the user breaches any provision of these terms or if the provider determines that the use of the services by the user may pose a risk of harm to the provider, its affiliates, or other users.
completion: Upon termination, any provisions of these terms of service that should reasonably survive termination (including but not limited to the provisions regarding content ownership, licenses, indemnification, limitation of liability, and arbitration) will survive.

The provider may use and disclose submissions in any manner consistent with its Privacy Policy.
completion: Users who submit suggestions, ideas, feedback, or any other information to the provider represent and warrant that they have the right to make such submissions, and that such submissions do not infringe on any third-party rights.

completion: Users may not export or re-export any of the provider's services in violation of such laws or regulations, or use them for any purpose prohibited by such laws or regulations.

prompt: Force Majeure: The provider will not be responsible for any failure to perform any obligation under these terms of service if such failure is caused by events outside its reasonable control, including but not limited to, acts of God, war, terrorism, riots, embargoes, fires, floods, strikes, labor disputes, or governmental actions.

prompt: Survival: Any provisions of these terms of service that should reasonably survive termination (including but not limited to the provisions regarding content ownership, licenses, indemnification, limitation of liability, and arbitration) will survive.
completion: These provisions will survive for as long as necessary to fulfill their purposes, and will remain enforceable after these terms of service have terminated.

prompt: Entire Agreement: These terms of service, along with any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific services, constitute the entire agreement between the user and the provider and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written, between the parties relating to the subject matter of these terms of service.
completion: To the extent that there is any conflict or inconsistency between these terms of service and any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific services, the additional terms and conditions will take precedence for that service.

prompt: Payments: Users may make payments for services provided by the provider using one of the available payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and electronic funds transfer. All payments are due in advance of the services being provided.
completion: The provider reserves the right to suspend or terminate service for non-payment of fees.

prompt: Automatic Payments: Users may opt for automatic payments for the services provided by the provider. By setting up automatic payments, the user authorizes the provider to charge their payment method in accordance with the subscription or payment plan selected.
completion: Users should contact the provider if they wish to cancel or modify automatic payment settings.

prompt: Payment Disputes: Users who dispute a payment for services provided by the provider should contact the provider's customer service team within 30 days of the disputed payment. Refunds or credits may be issued at the discretion of the provider.
completion: In the event of a payment dispute, the provider may suspend or terminate service until the dispute is resolved.

prompt: Refunds: The provider may offer refunds or credits for unused services provided that the user contacts the provider's customer service team within 30 days of the payment for those services.
completion: Refunds or credits will be issued at the discretion of the provider and may be subject to the terms and conditions of the payment method used for the original payment.

prompt: Late Fees: Users who do not make payments for the services provided by the provider by the due date may be subject to late fees. Late fees will be assessed at the discretion of the provider and may be applied on a monthly basis.
completion: Late fees will not exceed the maximum allowed by applicable law and may be waived at the discretion of the provider.

prompt: Billing Information: Users are responsible for maintaining accurate and up-to-date billing information with the provider. This includes the user's name, billing address, payment method, and contact information.
completion: The provider is not responsible for any fees or charges incurred as a result of inaccurate or outdated billing information provided by the user.

prompt: Currency: Payments for services provided by the provider may be stated in a particular currency. Users are responsible for ensuring that they have selected the correct currency for their payment method.
completion: Any fees or charges incurred as a result of the user selecting the wrong currency will be the responsibility of the user.

prompt: Taxes: Users are responsible for paying any applicable taxes, including but not limited to, sales tax, value-added tax, or other taxes that may be imposed by the relevant jurisdiction.
completion: The provider may add taxes to the fees charged for services provided, where required by law.

prompt: Automatic Renewal: Users who sign up for subscription services provided by the provider may be enrolled in automatic renewal. This means that the provider will automatically renew the subscription at the end of each subscription period, using the payment method on file.
completion: Users may opt out of automatic renewal or cancel their subscription at any time.

prompt: Free Trials: Users who sign up for free trials of the provider's services may be required to provide valid payment information. If the user does not cancel the trial before the end of the trial period, the provider may automatically charge the payment method on file for the subscription.
completion: The provider will notify the user before the trial period ends and will provide instructions on how to cancel the trial.

prompt: No Refunds for Promotional Pricing: Users who sign up for services provided by the provider at a discounted promotional price may not be eligible for refunds or credits at the discounted promotional price.
completion: Users who wish to cancel their service may be eligible for a refund or credit at the current full price of the service, at the discretion of the provider.

prompt: Subscription Changes: Users who wish to change their subscription level or plan should contact the provider's customer service team. Subscription changes may result in changes to the fees charged for the services provided.
completion: Subscription changes will be effective at the end of the current subscription period.

prompt: Cardholder Disputes: Users who dispute a charge with their payment card issuer related to services provided by the provider may be subject to suspension or termination of the services until the dispute is resolved. The provider reserves the right to dispute any chargebacks or reversals.
completion: User accounts may be terminated for excessive cardholder disputes.

prompt: Authorization: Users authorize the provider to charge their payment method for any services provided as agreed upon between the provider and the user. Users may revoke this authorization at any time by contacting the provider's customer service team.
completion: Revocation of authorization may result in the suspension or termination of services.

prompt: Security: The provider takes reasonable measures to ensure the security of payment information used to make payments for services provided by the provider. However, the user acknowledges and agrees that there are inherent risks associated with the transmission of data over the internet.
completion: The user agrees to use the provider's services at their own risk and to take appropriate measures to protect their own personal and financial data.

prompt: Payment Processing: The provider may use third-party payment processors to process payments made by users for services provided by the provider.
completion: Users acknowledge and agree that their use of third-party payment processors is subject to the terms and conditions of those processors, in addition to these terms of service.

prompt: Payment Frequency: Users may be required to make payments for services provided by the provider on a recurring basis, in accordance with the subscription or payment plan selected.
completion: Users may be required to make payments on a monthly, quarterly, or annual basis, depending on the terms of the subscription or payment plan.

prompt: Card Information Storage: The provider may store the user's payment card information for use in future transactions for services provided by the provider.
completion: The provider takes reasonable measures to ensure the security of stored payment information, but users should take appropriate measures to protect their own personal and financial data.

prompt: Billing Cycle: The billing cycle for services provided by the provider may begin on the date of sign-up, or on a specific date each month, depending on the terms of the subscription or payment plan selected.
completion: Users are responsible for ensuring that they are aware of the billing cycle for their subscription or payment plan.

prompt: Fee Changes: The provider may change the fees charged for services provided by the provider at any time. Users will be notified of any fee changes in advance of their next billing cycle.
completion: Continued use of the provider's services following any fee changes constitutes the user's acceptance of the new fees.

prompt: Suspension or Termination: The provider may suspend or terminate services for users who breach any provision of these terms of service or if the provider determines that the user's use of the services may pose a risk of harm to the provider, its affiliates, or other users.
completion: The provider is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of such suspension or termination.

prompt: Emergency Maintenance: The provider may perform emergency maintenance or other system updates that may result in a temporary disruption of services. Users will be notified of any planned maintenance in advance.
completion: The provider is not responsible for any losses or damages incurred as a result of service disruption caused by emergency maintenance or system updates.

prompt: Data Usage Charges: Users may be responsible for any data usage charges incurred as a result of their use of services provided by the provider. Users should consult their carrier for information on data usage charges.
completion: The provider is not responsible for any data usage charges incurred as a result of using the services provided.

prompt: Account Information: Users are responsible for safeguarding their account information, including usernames, passwords, and other login credentials. Users should contact the provider's customer service team immediately if they suspect that their account information has been compromised.
completion: The provider is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of unauthorized access to the user's account.

prompt: Non-transferable: The user's subscription or payment plan is non-transferable and may not be transferred to any other user or account.
completion: The user may not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer their subscription or payment plan to any other party.

prompt: Content Ownership: The content available on this website is owned by the website owner or licensed to them for use. Content includes but is not limited to text, images, audio, and video.
completion: Unauthorized use or reproduction of website content is strictly prohibited.

prompt: Permitted Use: Users may use website content for personal, non-commercial purposes, provided that the user does not modify or alter the content in any way.
completion: Any use of website content for commercial purposes requires written permission from the website owner or their authorized representative.

prompt: Restrictions on Use: Users may not reproduce, distribute, publicly display, or create derivative works from website content without the express written permission of the website owner.
completion: Users may not use website content in a manner that violates the law or the rights of any third party.

prompt: Attribution: Users who use website content in accordance with these terms of service should provide attribution to the website owner or the author of the content, where appropriate.
completion: Attribution should include the website URL or other identifying information provided by the website owner.

prompt: User-Generated Content: Users who submit user-generated content to this website grant the website owner a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, and perpetual license to use, reproduce, modify, and publish the content for any purpose in any media.
completion: Users are responsible for ensuring that their user-generated content does not violate any laws or infringe on any intellectual property rights, including but not limited to copyright or trademark.

prompt: Monitoring of User-Generated Content: The website owner reserves the right to monitor user-generated content submitted to the website and to remove any content deemed inappropriate or in violation of these terms of service.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of the removal of user-generated content.

prompt: User-Generated Content Standards: Users should submit only user-generated content that is truthful, accurate, and complete. Users should not submit content that is illegal, fraudulent, defamatory, or obscene.
completion: The website owner reserves the right to remove any user-generated content that violates these standards.

prompt: License to User-Generated Content: By submitting user-generated content to this website, the user grants other users of the website a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, and modify the content for their own personal, non-commercial use.
completion: This license is granted in accordance with the terms of service and does not affect the ownership or rights of the website owner or the user who submitted the content.

prompt: Third-Party Content: This website may contain content provided by third parties, including but not limited to advertisements, links to third-party websites, and articles written by guest authors.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of third-party content.

prompt: Linking to Third-Party Websites: This website may contain links to third-party websites. Users who follow these links do so at their own risk.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of following external links.

prompt: Advertisements: This website may contain advertisements from third-party advertisers. Users who interact with these advertisements do so at their own risk.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of interactions with third-party advertisers.

prompt: Removal of Third-Party Content: The website owner reserves the right to remove any third-party content that is deemed inappropriate or in violation of these terms of service.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of the removal of third-party content.

prompt: Intellectual Property: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, audio, and video, is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
completion: Users may not use website content in a manner that violates any intellectual property laws or infringes on any rights of the website owner.

prompt: DMCA Notice and Takedown: The website owner complies with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). Users who believe their content has been improperly used on this website may submit a DMCA notice.
completion: The website owner will respond to DMCA notices in accordance with the law.

prompt: Disclaimer of Warranties: The website owner makes no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of website content or the suitability of website content for any purpose. Users who use website content do so at their own risk.
completion: The website owner is not responsible for any damages or losses incurred as a result of using website content.

prompt: Limitation of Liability: The website owner is not liable for any damages or losses, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, arising out of the use or inability to use website content or the website itself.
completion: This limitation of liability applies to all claims, whether based on contract, tort, or any other legal theory.

prompt: Indemnification: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless the website owner and its affiliates, officers, agents, and employees from any claims, liabilities, damages, or expenses arising out of the use or inability to use website content or the website itself.
completion: This indemnification obligation applies to all claims, whether based on contract, tort, or any other legal theory.

prompt: Termination: The website owner may terminate a user's access to the website at any time for any reason, without notice.
completion: Upon termination, the user must immediately stop using the website and all website content.

prompt: Modification of Terms of Service: The website owner reserves the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Users who continue to use the website after modifications have been made agree to the modified terms of service.
completion: Users should review the terms of service regularly to ensure they are aware of any changes.

prompt: Governing Law: These terms of service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the website owner is located.
completion: Any disputes arising out of these terms of service will be resolved in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the website owner is located.

prompt: Entire Agreement: These terms of service constitute the entire agreement between the website owner and the user and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.
completion: Users who have questions or concerns about these terms of service should contact the website owner's customer service team.

prompt: Waiver: The website owner's failure to enforce any provision of these terms of service does not constitute a waiver of that provision or of any other provision.
completion: The website owner's rights and remedies under these terms of service are cumulative and not exclusive.

prompt: Severability: If any provision of these terms of service is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.
completion: The parties will replace the invalid or unenforceable provision with a valid and enforceable provision that achieves, to the extent possible, the original purpose and intent of the invalid or unenforceable provision.

prompt: Survival: The provisions of these terms of service that by their nature should survive termination of these terms of service will survive, including but not limited to the provisions regarding content ownership, restrictions on use, and limitation of liability.
completion: The termination of these terms of service does not affect any rights or obligations that accrued prior to termination.

prompt: Professional Conduct: All community members are expected to conduct themselves in a professional and respectful manner towards others.
completion: Harassment, discrimination, or any other form of abusive behavior will not be tolerated.

prompt: Inappropriate Content: Community members should not post any content that contains profanity, sexually explicit material, or hate speech.
completion: Posting such content may result in immediate suspension or termination of community membership.

prompt: Respect for Diversity: Community members should respect and value the differences in others and avoid derogatory comments or actions based on race, ethnicity, gender, religion, or sexual orientation.
completion: Acts of intolerance or discrimination may result in disciplinary action.

prompt: Intellectual Property: Community members should respect the intellectual property rights of others and should not reproduce or distribute copyrighted material without proper attribution or permission.
completion: Community members who violate intellectual property rights may face legal consequences.

prompt: Openness to Feedback: Community members should be open to feedback and constructive criticism from other members.
completion: Constructive feedback is an opportunity to learn and grow as a professional.

prompt: Collaboration: Community members should strive to work collaboratively and be respectful of the contributions of others.
completion: Working together as a community can lead to better outcomes and a stronger sense of belonging.

prompt: Compliance with Policies: Community members should comply with all community policies, including those related to code of conduct and data protection.
completion: Violations may result in suspension or termination of community membership.

prompt: Reporting Violations: Community members who witness a violation of community policies should report it to the appropriate authority immediately.
completion: Reporting violations helps ensure a safe and respectful environment for all community members.

prompt: Accountability: Community members are accountable for their actions and behaviors and should take responsibility for any mistake or offense.
completion: Admitting to and learning from mistakes can lead to growth and improvement as a professional.

prompt: Continuous Improvement: Community members should continuously work towards improving themselves and their contributions to the community.
completion: Continuously learning and growing can lead to expanded opportunities and personal and professional development.
